titles.title: A bill to require the Commodity Credit Corporation to refund to first processors of sugarcane and sugar beets marketing assessments collected by the Corporation during fiscal year 1991, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S561)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Agricultural Production.

committee.name: Senate Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry
committee.subcommittee: Agricultural Production and Stabilization of Prices

bill.summary: 1/21/1993--Introduced. Requires the Commodity Credit Corporation to refund to first processors of sugarcane and sugar beets marketing assessments collected during FY 1991.
